name: EndStageRenalDiseaseConditionsICD10
title: End Stage Renal Disease Conditions ICD10
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains condition or diagnosis terms representing end stage renal disease),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a diagnosis of stage 5 chronic kidney disease and who have had a kidney transplant or are on renal dialysis),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes chronic kidney disease ICD10  diagnosis codes that represent end stage renal disease with renal dialysis or kidney transplant.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not representative of stage 5 chronic kidney disease with transplant or dialysis.)

contains.display: Hypertensive chronic kidney disease with stage 5 chronic kidney disease or end stage renal disease
Hypertensive heart and chronic kidney disease without heart failure, with stage 5 chronic kidney disease, or end stage renal disease
Hypertensive heart and chronic kidney disease with heart failure and with stage 5 chronic kidney disease, or end stage renal disease
